name: BLOOD HARVEST (itch) (Nah Yeah Games)
description:
NOTE: Some people experience choppy audio when playing in the browser due to the adaptive Music & SFX

Our submission to Ludum Dare 52, the theme was "harvest".

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/blood-harvest

Lore:
Staten Island, 1923.

Ernest is the spawn of a vampire so old their name is forgotten. Ernest simply knows him as, “The Lord”.

After a long journey by sea, Ernest arrives with his master in New York. Living in the shadows with what is left of his master’s ancient wealth, he buys a condemned building and opens a speakeasy.

Ernest has one duty, fulfill his master’s insatiable thirst for blood and free him from his unholy prison… Or become his next blood bag.

Credits:
Sound Design, Music Composition, and Audio Engineering by: @theghostoftommy
Character, Prop, and Environment Art by: https://www.twitch.tv/gundestiny
Direction, Game Design, Tech, and Tech Art by: https://twitter.com/DrowsyAu
